Looking AheadAppendix Introduction
In 2022, we engaged a third-party 
consultancy to assess and rank our 
ESG priorities. As part of this robust 
process, we solicited the perspectives 
of our key internal and external 
stakeholders—including employees, 
Board members, customers, and 
shareholders. Based on this feedback 
and the deliberations of our Executive 
Leadership Team (ELT) and members of 
our Board, we identified and ranked 
the ESG issues that are most important 
to our business and stakeholders.
This matrix maps these issues and their 
relative importance to our stakeholders 
and to our business performance.ESG Materiality Matrix
